Text: LMK Change Order Cc Attached is Change Order which has the changes Chris Booth made and a few minor type type changes I made I dont know Chris Calger or his title so if you would like me to obtain his signature please advise Kathy x
LMK Change Order Ben Chris Attached is the latest draft of Change Order for your review input Kathy
GE LMKChange Order Rev Cc Attached is Change Order which has been revised to add the additional items you requested Please let me know if you have any changes or comments Thanks Kathy Clark

LM Transformer Spec and Data Sheets Cc Bob These are the last specs and data sheets I have in my files Please make the necessary updates and return them to me for incorporation into the final agreement Thanks Kathy Forwarded by Kathleen ClarkENRONDEVELOPMENT on AM Robert Kraszewski AM To Kathleen ClarkENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Harry OkabayashiENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject LM Transformer Spec and Data Sheets Kathy Attached is the latest full set of ABB Transformer Spec and data sheets Regards Bob Kraszewski
Comparision of Rev to Cc a comparision to show the latest changes to the agreement The changes include the spec and data sheets

Enron Contract VerbageThe last sentence of this clause was not included in my last draft After being on vacation for four days I cant remember why I did or didnt do what Please let me know if you agree that this last sentence should be added and if there are any other changes needed Thanks Kathy Forwarded by Kathleen ClarkENRONDEVELOPMENT on AM on AM To cc Subject Enron Contract Verbage Dear Team Dave mentioned that probably the only other change would be in the assignment section article xxii and that should not be any big change MIKE Forwarded by Michael O SandridgeFieldMarketingUSTRAABB on AM Embedded image moved to file picpcx Frank ChmielStLouisUSTRAABB AM Phone Dept FIELD SALES To Michael O SandridgeField BBUSTRA cc Karla HeskethField BBUSTRA David BBUSTRA Subject Enron Contract Verbage Security Level Internal Mike When we spoke this morning Dave advised that one change to the language that will be required is the addition of the words in red in bold added by ABB at the end of this paragraph in section of the contract In the case of an assignment to a party described in ii vi or vii other than Enron Engineering Construction or NEPCO Seller shall be entitled to request and receive an appropriate guaranty letter of credit payment bond or other reasonable form of payment security in amount not to exceed the amount of the Purchase Amount remaining to be paid at the time of the assignment unless the assignor agrees to remain liable for all future liabilities under this Agreement A letter of guaranty letter of credit or payment bond provided by an entity rated BBB or better shall be deemed to be an appropriate form of security for the purpose of this provision so long as payment in full has been made in accordance with the schedule set forth in Article VI Additional commentary may come later today when Dave reaches his first stop on his flight back to Raliegh Frank picpcx

Change Order for LM Cc Attached is CO which was signed and executed Attached is a draft of CO which may or may not have been signed Kay Please forward an executed copy of CO so we can continue issuing Change Orders Thanks Kathy

Authorization for Haul Install Option at Austin Project Cc Attached is a draft letter which provides authorization to ABB for the haul install option at Austin After it has been signed please send me a copy for my files Thank you Kathy
Change Order to ABB Purchase Agreement Cc a draft of Change Order to ABB Purchase Agreement for your review Please advise if you have any changes or comments Thanks Kathy x
ABB Purchase Agreement Final VersionAttached is the final version
Panama I AgreementCheryl said you were looking for the Panama I Agreement I converted it to Word just for you
